name: manning
content:

present participle of
man
Add to word list
Add to word list
HR, WORKPLACE the process of providing people to do a job, or the number of people who are available to do a job: The freight company will be responsible for the manning of the ships. The Army always has to work hard to sustain full manning in peacetime. Manning levels have been reduced by 1,000 (40%) since March.
